resources.string: Player name can not be empty.
Unable to read game data if root is not permitted.
Root permission is required by the app to read your Arcaea game data.\n\nPlease permit root permission if you trust our app.
ArcaeaScores reads Arcaea game data by Root and automatically computes best 30 scores, developed by Rosemoe.\n\nGet updates here: https://github.com/Rosemoe/ArcaeaScores/releases/latest/
